attributes.action: remove all health and state benefits to Non British persons who are in our country illegally
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the government to remove all rights to free health care and any state benifits to people who have entered this country illegally.  Britain should take on the same stance of Australia or America and not allow these people to drain already stretched resources that are ruining our health system. The government so far has ignore the plight of its citizens. The law abiding tax paying person who can not get the health care they pay for with their N.I contributition or have the pot holes in the roads they use filled as the council resources are being stretch to accomodate illegal immigrants and feed them. I petition the government to allow the British public to vote on this issue.
